pageContext.Title: 6 - Back-end & Infrastructure
pageContext.Description: In this project the students will get in touch with the back-end side of web development, understand what lies beyond the front-end coding and dive into the infrastructure that supports some of the most useful services front-end developers use on a regular basis.
